content: So, to take your first set of questions, just on M&A, obviously, anyone in the advertising ecosystem is feeling this, and those that weren't quick to respond and may feel currently undercapitalized, are probably the most target-rich types of acquisition At the same time, what I would say is that I think those that have predicated their ad businesses more on interest-based advertising and ad targeting, which as we know through changes being made in the Apple ecosystem, the coming deprecation of the third party cookie, has put that whole segment of the digital media and ad market in sort of a tenuous space.
